name: Early Access Webinar: June 28th
description: We're announcing our early access program for developers. On June 28th, we'll introduce the product and give out access to the platform for those eager to get started with an early version of ues.io.

name: Deep Dive Webinar #1: Building an Advanced CPQ Application with ues.io declaratively and then extending it with code.
description: Join us on 12 July (17:00 CET, 11:00 EST, 08;00 PDT) as we reveal the intricacies of building and extending a sophisticated Configure, Price, Quote (CPQ) application for Morandi Storenfabrik using the declarative platform ues.io.
